phrases: The strawberry glasses were still being sold at the 100 yen store.
But when I thought about how importantly Hachi treated them
without buying any spares,
the cut on my left cheek that I do not even remember getting
started hurting like hell.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
That will be 105 yen.
Tonight, I will return home and apologize to Hachi.
Thank you very much.
The glass probably broke.
I cannot remember, but I think that is what happened.
It is also a mystery how I ended up at Ren's place
when I was trying to be careful not to cause a scandal...
I cannot rely on Yasu's kindness anymore.
Because
Yasu is not mine.
Reira, I am sorry, but I have got to get back to work right away.
Sorry.
I will come home as soon as I can.
Can you be here on your own until then?
I am locking the door behind me.
Do not open the door for anyone.
I am sorry, Yasu, to call you outta the blue like this.
I could not think of anyone else I could depend on.
I ran away from the recording.
Takumi said he is getting married, and I could not bring myself to sing.
But I do not know where to go.
No matter where I go, I feel like everyone is watching me.
I am scared.
If people found out that I ran away from a recording,
they would be disappointed in me.
The staff, and the fans,.,
They would ditch me, saying I am finished.
But I cannot sing.
What am I to do?
I am worthless unless I sing.
I just heard back from Mr. Takeda!
She did not go back to the hotel either!
She left with her stuff, right?
Did you try calling her cell phone?
Several times, but she will not answer.
But why did she run away like that?
She was all excited until a bit earlier, saying she is going to sell a million copies.
Does anyone have any clue where else she might have gone?
I was transferred here recently,
so there is still much I do not know about Reira's private life.
Maybe she went to her secret lover!
IGNORED
Maybe she went to her secret lover!
IGNORED
IGNORED
Come to think of it, does she have any close friends?
Come to think of it, does she have any close friends?
I have not a clue.
Do not ask me.
But Takumi, you and Reira have been friends since you were kids, right?
So what?
Nothing.
What should we do, Takumi?
Should we proceed with recording anyway?
With all this commotion around us, we cannot concentrate.
We cannot do it.
I guess.
I am sorry.
It is okay, Mari.
Your job is to take care of Reira,
so just worry about Reira and not about anything else.
Okay.
If you understand that, then go find her and drag her back!
I am sorry.
Do not cry Mari.
That guy is scary.
I am scared of him, too.
Drinking on the job?
It is water!
If work is that important to you, do not go saying something
that would upset our songstress before the recording.
If it is to test her professionalism,
you are being too much of an evil coach.
I do not know what you are talking about.
Do not try to act stupid!
You know Reira's in love with you.
Do not put it so simply!
Years of acting like I did not know just went down the drain!
Acting like you do not know will not solve the problem.
If you get married,
Reira might not be able to sing anymore, y'know.
If me getting married means she is going to stop singing,
then we have big problems.
I have no feelings of love for her.
I cannot help it.
Well, I guess.
But if Reira will not sing, Trapnest is finished.
I know that!
So what do you want me to do?!
If the lord showed a little more love, the princess might want to sing.
Are you telling me to do it with Reira?!
She is like a little sister to me!
There is no way I could do that!
But you are not a blood relative.
That is not the point!
But you have always been the type to do whatever it takes
to achieve your objectives.
Compared to marrying an ordinary girl who is only after your money,
you will end up with a larger castle with a marriage of convenience to Reira.
CASTLE?! - Castle? - It fits.
I never knew you were
FROM THE EDO PERIOD?
so ambitious.
I would never do such a thing.
I am just suggesting a way of living
for someone as greedy and brutal as you.
What is that supposed to mean?!
Do not try to act like you are a good person!
You are the man who abandoned your woman and friends!
You even sold your soul, all for your own success!
Although I am the one who bought it.
My soul?
You were a punk rocker to the core.
You were coolest when you could play whatever you wanted in a small hut.
Although you still... are a pretty cool guy...
I want to hear Ren Honjo's soul shout!
But do not you think it is funny?
The bigger the castle gets, the more confining it feels?
Before I knew it, I had locked my cute little sister
in the top of the high tower.
Even though I cannot love her.
That is the greatest sin of my life.
But she only knows how to sing, and nothing else.
And I cannot turn back now.
If only there were a prince who would climb up that tower to hold her.
Turn off your phone at least when we are recording!
AN ANIME SONG RINGTONE?
But we are not recording.
Yeah, but at least have it on silent.
Hello, darling!
No, that is okay.
The Lord is in a foul mood, so we are not getting any work done.
He is right beside me.
Who is it?!
The former prince.
Though he is bald.
Um, excuse me.
You are Takumi from Trapnest, right?
I am a huge fan of yours!
Can I shake your hand?
Thank you so much!
Who is that, Mommy?
Someone who sings songs?
Someone who plays instruments.
Was not that great?
Sorry.
Causing you trouble at a busy time for you.
Reira will hate me again for doing this.
But for her to say she is worthless unless she sings?
I did not break up with her so I could hear her say such things.
Do something about it.
If that is how you feel, then you do something about it.
Being the hated one is my exclusive right.
Yasu, you traitor!
- That baldie!
- Reira, please calm down!
It is all right!
I will not take you back!
The recording has been postponed!
Takumi asked that you be given time off until you are ready to sing again.
He went and talked to the president about this himself.
We will have to rearrange the schedule, but at the very least,
you will be able to take off this entire week
that was set aside for recording.
Is not that great?
Takumi may say some harsh things,
but he certainly thinks about you, Reira.
You are wrong, Mari.
Huh?
Takumi has abandoned me.
He does not need a singer who runs away from her job!
What are you saying?!
I am sure that is not true!
I am sorry Mari.
I will return to the studio right away, so let everyone know.
But you could not possibly sing in this condition.
Please!
Do not take away my chance to sing!
Singing is all I have got.
This restaurant pisses me off.
Do not play Trapnest songs.
Play some Enka!
You are ruining our ramen noodles, old man!
I am sorry!
We will eat quickly and leave.
It is only natural that the radio would play what is popular.
Besides, it is a song Ren wrote.
You should like it.
This is not Ren's.
But more importantly, you need to see a doctor.
A doctor?
Memory loss is not normal at all.
I will come with you.
No way!
You know, you have been rude lately, telling me I am strange.
But you were saying that yourself, too.
You could have some kind of brain disease.
You should get it checked.
I am fine.
Darn.
I should not have told you.
Annoying, annoying, annoying!
Thanks for the meal.
Now, I will listen to your whining as I promised.
It is all right.
If I tell you, you might just rub salt in the wound.
I want to hear it!
How could things have come to this in one day?!
Come to this?
Do not you know?
What the hell have you been doing?
What about you?!
Where have you been hiding since last night?!
At such an important time for Hachi!
That is so cold of you!
As a friend,
should not you have gone straight to her and heard what she had to say?
She would only cry and apologize to me.
She would not tell me anything.
So you went.
You two are both women.
She might have opened up and talked to you about her true feelings.
But when I went back this morning,
Hachiko would not say a word to me either!
She had Takumi do all the talking.
What did he say?
It is okay.
Tell me.
Nothing will shock me anymore.
He said they are getting married.
You ARE shocked!
Of course you are!
It makes no sense, right?!
I am sorry, Nobu.
Are you all right?
Well, ah... yeah.
I sorta knew it was over from the way Nana was acting yesterday.
Nana?
After all, it is Takumi she loves.
I knew that from the beginning.
But you called her Hachi in front of everyone.
But I am part of this, so why am I on the outside of the fence?
Am I that unreliable to her?
It is okay to cry, Nobuo!
Cry on my shoulder!
What are you doing?!
This is no time to be embarrassed!
It is just between us.
But people are staring...
So what?!
You are too short to be acting cool anyway!
Do not call me short!
At least I am taller than you!
I know that!
I also know that you have got a heart way bigger than mine!
Before I met you, I hated everyone!
I could not trust anybody!
But then when I met you,
I felt for the first time that this world is not all that bad after all!
Terashima.
Thanks for these.
You are not unreliable, Nobu.
Do not get down on yourself just because some girl dumped you.
Your spikes are digging into my neck.
Nobu's shoulders are way scrawnier than Ren's,
but they were not shaking.
I was offering him my shoulder,
but ended up borrowing his instead.
I owe Nobu so much.
So I really cannot make up with Hachi.
I will take the strawberry glass to Ren's place.
WEEKLY SEARCH MAGAZINE EDITING DEPT.
I cannot use this!
How could you stick with them for a full month
and not get a shot of them together?!
Because they are on completely different schedules,
and never leave the place together, you see!
Do not you see me!
You probably did something to make them cautious.
All of you!
Idiots!
Let us just give up on that idea
and write an article using two different shots.
I am not compromising.
You want someone else beating us to the story?
Kurata.
Fly to their hometown immediately.
Huh?
Trapnest is recording in the studio every day this week.
Following them will not do us any good.
CONFIDENTIAL
In the meantime,
gather everything you can on Ren Honjo and Nana Osaki's backgrounds.
What a drag.
Gaia seems to be reluctant about giving BLAST their debut,
but this will make the greatest Battle of the Bands.
I will create a huge festival for you
and bring you onto the same stage as Trapnest in a heartbeat.
You should thank me, Nana Osaki.
The curtains are about to rise on your fateful game.
Miss Komatsu.
Registered mail for you!
MISS NANA KOMATSU, THANK YOU FOR CONSULTING WITH OUR FIRM.
WE HAVE GATHERED SOME LISTINGS OF PROPERTIES THAT FIT THE CONDITIONS YOU NOTED THE OTHER DAY.
PLEASE REVIEW THE MATERIAL.
IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO VIEW ANY OF THE PROPERTIES, PLEASE CONTACT ME AT THE NUMBER BELOW.
I LOOK
MONTHLY RENT 1,000,000 YEN
You know, Hachi...
I was hostile towards Trapnest
because I was envious of Reira for stealing Ren's heart,
not as a woman but as a singer.
I only wanted Ren to notice me more.
I never wanted to make them my enemy.
It is so moving, is not it?
This will sell way more than a million.
How much harder are you going to push her until you are satisfied?
I have no idea what you are talking about.
At least let me accompany her with my guitar.
Since I cannot hug her.
But ever since that day when you were taken away from me,
I could not help but feel the need to defeat them.
I wanted you back... no matter what.
I cannot count how many nights
I wished tomorrow would never come
To live as I am without being fake
What do I need
If I do not believe in myself, what can I believe in
The answer is too close to see
Black tears are falling down
I have nothing, only sadness
I cannot put it into words
My whole body starts to ache
I cannot stand it anymore on my own
